sourcesContent:
{{dialogTitle}}
Bill No receipt @if (libraryForm.get('no')?.hasError('required')) { Please enter bill no }
Title credit_card @if (libraryForm.get('title')?.hasError('required')) { Please enter title }
Subject Mathematics Java Networking Politics Animation Other @if (libraryForm.get('subject')?.hasError('required')) { Subject is required }
Purchase date @if (libraryForm.get('date')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
Select Department Mechanical Science Mathematics Computer Civil Management @if (libraryForm.get('department')?.hasError('required')) { Select Any Department }
Asset Type Book CD DVD News Paper @if (libraryForm.get('type')?.hasError('required')) { Select Any Department }
Status In Stock Out Of Stock Issue Repair @if (libraryForm.get('status')?.hasError('required')) { Select Any Status }
